definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: grasp, take hold, take posses-sion (Ar. 0’axad-a, Sab. [[אחַדַ]] Sab. Denkm.:39, Aram. [[אֲחַד]], 0eh.ad As. aḫazu, Eth. 0axza:)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָחַז]] Ex 15:14 +; [[אָֽחֲזׇה]] Job 23:11, Is 33:14; sf. [[אֲחָזַנִי]] 2Sa 1:9; 1 s. sf. [[אֲחַזְתִּיו]] Ct So 3:4, etc.; Impf. [[יאׁחֵז]] Job 17:9 +; [[וַיּ֫אׁחֶז]] 2Sa 6:6; 3 fs. [[תּאׁחֵז]] De 32:41; [[וַתּאׁחֶז]]Ru 3:15; [[וַתּׂחֶז]] 2Sa 20:9; [[וׇאׂחֵז]] Ju Jdg 20:6; [[יאׁחֵזוּן]] Is 13:8; sf. [[יאׁחֲזֵ֫מוֹ]] Ex 15:15; [[יאׁחֱזוּךְ]] Je 13:21, etc.;—† as ´[[פ]] gutt. [[וַיֶּאֱחׂז]] Ju Jdg 16:3 1Ki 6:10; 2 ms. [[תֶּאֱחׂז]] Ec 7:18; Inf. [[אֲחׂז]] 1Ki 6:6; [[אֱחׂז]] 1Ch 13:9 + 3 t.; Imv. [[אֱחׂז]] Ex 4:4, 2Sa 2:21, [[אֶחֳזִי־]] Ru 3:15; [[אֶחֱזוּ]] Ct So 2:15; [[אֱחָׂזוּ]] Ne 7:3; Pt. act. [[אׂחֵז]] 2Ch 25:5; pass. [[אָחוּז]] Es 1:6, etc.;—grasp, take hold of, sq. [[בְּ]] Ge 25:26, Ex 4:4 (both J) Ju Jdg 16:3, Jdg 20:6 ( = [[וַיַּחֲזֵק בְּ]] Jdg 19:29) 2Sa 4:10, 2Sa 6:6, 2Sa 20:9, 1Ki 1:51, Ru 3:15, Ru 3:15; 1Ki 6:6 of beams having hold in a wall; (cf. [[בֵּית אֲבָנִים יֶיֽחֱזֶהָ]] Job 8:17; Hoffm rds. [[יׁחֲזׇה]] = ´[[יאׁ]]); also Ct So 7:9 of taking hold of branches, in metaph.; poet, fig., of God's seizing man in wrath Job 16:12; taking hold graciously Ps 73:23; taking hold of judgment De 32:41; subj. man [[בַּאֲשֻׁרוֹ אָֽחֲזׇה רַגְלִי]] Job 23:11 (‖[[דַּרְכּוֹ שָׁמַרְתִּי]] cf. also Job 17:9); of taking hold of folly Ec 2:3 cf. Ec 7:18; subj. [[הַשַּׁחַר]] Job 38:13, [[לֶאֱחׂו]] [[בְּבַנְפוֹת הָאָָרֶץ]]; also sq. acc. Ju Jdg 1:6, Jdg 12:6, Jdg 16:21, 2Sa 2:21, Is 5:29, Ct So 2:15, So 3:4, 1Ch 13:9, 2Ch 25:5, Ps 56:1, Ps 137:9; cf. 1Ki 6:10 (cf. v:1Ki 6:6 supr.), subj. [[הַיׇּחוּעַ]], [[אֶת־]] ´[[וַיֶּא]] [[הַבַּיִת בַּעֲחֵי אֲרָזִים]]; of a snare catching the heel, in metaph. Job 18:9; fig., subj. God Ps 77:5; God's hand Ps 139:10; subj. pain, sorrow, fear, etc. Ex 15:14, Ex 15:15, 2Sa 1:9, Job 21:6, Job 30:16, Ps 48:7, Ps 119:53, Is 21:3, Is 33:14, Je 13:21, Je 49:24; subj. man, obj. fear, etc. Job 18:20, Is 13:8; obj. [[דֶּרֶךְ]] take one's way Job 17:9 [[יאׁחֵז חַדִּיק]] [[דַּרְכּוֹ]] AV RV hold on his way (cf. Job 23:11 supr., & As. ṣabâtu urḫu, e. g. V. R:1, 74);—abs. Ne 7:3 of barring gates; pt. pass. caught Ec 9:12; fastened, held Es 1:6; taken (by lot) 1Ch 24:6, 1Ch 24:6, 1Ch 24:6 (on text v. Öt); taken out of a number Nu 31:30, Nu 31:47; pt. act. of same form [[אֲחֻזֵי חֶרֶב]] Ct So 3:8 cf. Thes Ba:NB 175 & Eth. Pt.; similarly Aram. [[אָחִיד]], e.g. Targum Am 2:5; 0ah.id e.g. SyrVer Ju Jdg 8:10, 1Ch 5:18; & Ez Eze 41:6, Eze 41:6 (but v. Co).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נאׁחֲזוּ]] Jos 22:9; ´[[וְנאׁ]] (cons.) Nu 32:30; Impf. [[וַיֵּאָחֲזוּ]] Ge 47:27; Imv. [[הֵאָֽחֲזוּ]] Ge 34:10 Jos 22:19; Pt. [[נֶאֱחָז]] Ge 22:13; [[נֶאֱחָזִים]] Ec 9:12; —be caught Ge 22:13, Ec 9:12; elsewhere have possessions Ge 34:10, Ge 47:27, Nu 32:30, Jos 22:9, Jos 22:19 (P).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְאַחֵז]] Job 26:9 c. acc. enclose, overlay (so As. Dl:W, p. 294, cf. Aram 0ah.d, shut).
